name: SUREToken

attributes.name: transfer
balanceOf
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
@notice Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner.
It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner`
modifier anymore.
attributes.name: renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
transferFrom
approve
allowance
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval
mint

attributes.documentation:
Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
attributes.name: finishMinting

attributes.documentation: Limit token transfer until the crowdsale is over.
attributes.name: canTransfer

attributes.documentation: Set the contract that can call release and make the token transferable.
attributes.name: setReleaseAgent

attributes.documentation: Owner can allow a particular address (a crowdsale contract) to transfer tokens despite the lock up period.
attributes.name: setTransferAgent

attributes.documentation: End locking state
attributes.name: releaseTokenTransfer

attributes.documentation: Resume locking state.
attributes.name: stopTokenTransfer

attributes.documentation: The function can be called only before or after the tokens have been releasesd
attributes.name: inReleaseState

attributes.documentation: The function can be called only by a whitelisted release agent.
attributes.name: onlyReleaseAgent
